title: Sam&Max Save the World
description: Get ready to Save the World in this side-splitting six-episode "season" of gaming's first sitcom. Canine shamus Sam and his hyperkinetic rabbity-thing partner Max are faced with a baffling mystery. All around them, people are ending up hypnotized. Washed-up child stars. The host of a popular television talk show. Even the President of the United States! Can Sam & Max find the mastermind behind this evil scheme before the entire world slips into a hypnotic trance? In this first “season” of the episodic Sam & Max series, you get six full games that take Sam & Max deeper and deeper into a sinister mind-control plot. Uncover clues, interrogate suspects, crack all six bizarre cases, and find out why Sam & Max is the funniest game series in years!  This game requires the Xbox 360 hard drive for storage. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Sam & Max - Picture Pack #1
childDownloads.description: Be Sam! Be Max! Be a rat! Get this picture pack for a mere 100 points and get pics for these characters plus 9 more: the great Abe Lincoln (his re-animated statue anyways), the esteemed Mr. Featherly, Bosco, Hugh Bliss, Agent Superball, Sybil and the Soda Poppers. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Sam & Max - Picture Pack #2
childDownloads.description: Sam & Max Beyond Time and Space starts with a giant robot attack and never lets up, taking our valiant crime-fighters on a gut wrenching mission from the North Pole to outer space, Hell and back! The Beyond Time and Space cast is all here: the Maimtron 9000 battle robot, a gun-toting Santa Claus, groovy Momma Bosco, Jurgen, the emo vampire. And Satan! Assume Sam and Max's zombie forms, appear as hard-nosed private eye Flint Paper, or personify the disturbingly sexy Peepers. Twelve iconic characters in all. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Trial Game - Sam & Max Save the World
childDownloads.description: Get ready to Save the World in this side-splitting six-episode "season" of gaming's first sitcom.  In the trial version, join Sam & Max on their first case in years, as they investigate a trio of former child stars turned neighborhood vandals. Armed with wisecracks, their wits, and a slew of heavy household objects, the Freelance Police must uncover the motive behind these seemingly senseless crimes... and then track down the man behind it all.  When you unlock the full game, this simple case of local hypnosis grows to global proportions in the complete six-episode series. Can Sam & Max find the mastermind behind this evil scheme before the entire world slips into a hypnotic trance? Uncover clues, interrogate suspects, crack all six bizarre cases, and find out why Sam & Max is the funniest game series in years! This game requires the Xbox 360 hard drive for storage.

childDownloads.title: The Streets of Sam & Max Premium Theme
childDownloads.description: Dress up (with Sam & Max, dress down may say it better) your Xbox dashboard with gritty fixings from Sam & Max's world. You'll get Sam & Max's street along with their trusty DeSoto, their Office HQ of course, a suitably kitschy Tiki Bar from one of their island adventures, a Time Machine, and yes, Hell too! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
